name: Sun Company HikeHitch 2 Compass/ Thermometer Carabiner
description: Throw your keys on the Hitchhike 2 and never lose track of the temperature or the cardinal directions again.Carabiner clip snaps on nearly anywhere.Thermometer reads in Fahrenheit and Celsius scales down to -20º F and -30º C.Separate keyring keeps your keys out of the carabiner, reducing the chances of lost keys.Compact design can be a keyring or a zipper-pull.
